original_title: セミドキュメント　観光バス・濡れ濡れジャック
overview: A bus full of tour bus guide trainees is hijacked by two men after pulling over for a bathroom break. Loosely inspired by a 1977 bus jacking that occurred in Nagasaki.
tagline: An erotic comedy in which an unintentional busjack incident develops into unexpected slapstick
title: Semi-dokyumento: kankō basu - nure nure jakku
